Optional Adobe Postscript 3.
pxlmono driver supports UserCode/LockedPrint/SamplePrint/DocServer which requires foomatic-rip 3.43.2.14 or later. Visit Ricoh FAQ for details.
Lanier LD175 has been certified with Mandriva Linux Limited Edition 2005, Mandriva Linux 10.1, Mandriva Linux Corporate Desktop 3.0.
Throughput 75.
